# Patient Monitoring System
# >> Example Care Unit <<

targets.expr: max by (userid) (kafka_consumer_bps{topic="processed-topic"}) + max by (userid) (kafka_consumer_resp{topic="processed-topic"}) + max by (userid) (kafka_consumer_pulse{topic="processed-topic"}) + max by (userid) (kafka_consumer_temp{topic="processed-topic"})
